name: No Hamster's Sky
description:
Team members
Ruzhang Zhao-designer,programmer,

jimiasoph - designer, artist

Story

A little hamster who lives in an abandoned bag imagines a fantastic ballon adventure.

The gravity inside the bag changes every 10 seconds.

 When she gets gravity, she can eat food to get energy while falling.  When She is agravic, she can use the energy to propulse herself and ascent. 

Use the energy to adjust your flight attitude and fly to the destination. Don't exhaust the energy.

When you hit the wall or platform, the hamster can bounce back.
